title: NABARD Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 91 Assistant Manager Posts
description: The National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 91 Assistant Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, post-graduation, B.E/ B.Tech, Diploma in Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, can grab this chance and apply for the NABARD Recruitment 2025 . Here we provided more information about the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, education details, application fee, ...
